items.name: Berry
items.description: (Gen 2) Restores 10 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

items.name: Berry Juice
items.description: Restores 20 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

items.name: Berserk Gene
items.description: (Gen 2) On switch-in, raises holder's Attack by 2 and confuses it. Single use.

items.name: Bitter Berry
items.description: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is confused. Single use.

items.name: Black Belt
items.description: Holder's Fighting-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Black Glasses
items.description: Holder's Dark-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Bright Powder
items.description: An attack against the holder has its accuracy out of 255 lowered by 20.

items.name: Charcoal
items.description: Holder's Fire-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Cleanse Tag
items.description: Decreases the encounter rate of wild Pokmon.

items.name: Dragon Fang
items.description: No competitive use.

items.name: Focus Band
items.description: Holder has a ~11.7% chance to survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP.

items.name: Gold Berry
items.description: (Gen 2) Restores 30 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

items.name: Hard Stone
items.description: Holder's Rock-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Ice Berry
items.description: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is burned. Single use.

items.name: King's Rock
items.description: Holder's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch. Evolves Poliwhirl into Politoed and Slowpoke into Slowking when traded.

items.name: Leftovers
items.description: At the end of every turn, holder restores 1/16 of its max HP.

items.name: Light Ball
items.description: If held by a Pikachu, its Special Attack is doubled.

items.name: Lucky Punch
items.description: If held by a Chansey, its critical hit ratio is always at stage 2. (25% crit rate)

items.name: Magnet
items.description: Holder's Electric-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Metal Coat
items.description: Holder's Steel-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Metal Powder
items.description: If held by a Ditto, its Defense and Sp. Def are 1.5x, even while Transformed.

items.name: Mint Berry
items.description: (Gen 2) Holder wakes up if it is asleep. Single use.

items.name: Miracle Berry
items.description: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is confused or has a status condition. Single use.

items.name: Miracle Seed
items.description: Holder's Grass-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Mystery Berry
items.description: (Gen 2) Restores 5 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.

items.name: Mystic Water
items.description: Holder's Water-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Never-Melt Ice
items.description: Holder's Ice-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: No Item
items.description: Placeholder used in movesets that do not use an item.

items.name: Pink Bow
items.description: (Gen 2) Holder's Normal-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Poison Barb
items.description: Holder's Poison-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Polka Dot Bow
items.description: Raises power of Normal moves by 10%.

items.name: PRZCure Berry
items.description: Cures paralysis. One-time use.

items.name: PSNCure Berry
items.description: Cures poison. One-time use.

items.name: Quick Claw
items.description: Each turn, holder has a ~23.4% chance to move first in its priority bracket.

items.name: Scope Lens
items.description: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

items.name: Sharp Beak
items.description: Holder's Flying-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Silver Powder
items.description: Raises power of Bug-type moves by 10%.

items.name: Soft Sand
items.description: Holder's Ground-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Spell Tag
items.description: Holder's Ghost-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Stick
items.description: If held by a Farfetch'd, its critical hit ratio is always at stage 2. (25% crit rate)

items.name: Thick Club
items.description: If held by a Cubone or a Marowak, its Attack is doubled.

items.name: Twisted Spoon
items.description: Holder's Psychic-type attacks have 1.1x power.

items.name: Water Stone
items.description: Evolves Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, Shellder into Cloyster, Staryu into Starmie, Eevee into Vaporeon, Lombre into Ludicolo, and Panpour into Simipour when used.
